arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund XI vs Eintracht Frankfurt – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund are set to face Eintracht Frankfurt in the DFB-Pokal on Tuesday evening, with both teams eager to clinch a spot in the competition’s last-16. These two teams both met in the final back in 2017, which BVB won.
